ModMetaData.name: Combined Rib Replacements
ModMetaData.author: Gariba, (updated by MikeEpsilon)
ModMetaData.description: Adds a replacement rib that combines the medical, adrenaline and painkiller ribs in one. Credits to Ykara for the original EPOE mod on which this one is based. Updated to B18 by MikeEpsilon with permission.
